titleStmt.title: The declaration and proclamation of the army of God, owned by the Lord of Hosts in many victories, to all the good people of God throughout England, Scotland, and Ireland, &c. whereunto is annexed 17 necessary proposals for the enthro[ning] of Gods laws ...
titleStmt.author: Chamberlen, Peter, 1601-1683.
